Package oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits

Class PassageObject

java.lang.Object
oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits.AbstractObject
oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits.EditModelObject
oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits.PassageObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClickableObject, ClickableObjectWithUUID, DrawableObject, DrawableObjectWithText, DrawablePassageObject, MoveableObject, ObjectWithAPosition, ObjectWithAPositionAndUUID, ObjectWithUUID, SelectableObject, UpdatableObject
public class PassageObject extends EditModelObject implements DrawablePassageObject, SelectableObject, ObjectWithAPositionAndUUID, ObjectWithUUID, ClickableObjectWithUUID
ok so basically this represents an EditablePassage object but it's an GUI form instead. bottom text

    individualDraw​(Graphics2D g)
    Subclass-specific draw method.
    (package private) void
    individualUpdate()
    Updates passage name, puts this at the same position as the passage, makes sure that the link map is as it should be
    (compares key set to the passage's linked UUIDs, if they differ, only the UUID's in the passage's linked UUIDs are kept, and then any missing links (in linked UUIDs and not in link map) are constructed and added to the map)

    • PassageObject

      public PassageObject​(EditModelInterface model, ModelBitsPassageInterface passage)
      Constructor for the PassageObject
      Parameters:
      model - the model that it's part of
      passage - the passage this represents

  • Method Details

    • whatColourShouldThisObjectBe

      private void whatColourShouldThisObjectBe()
      Works out what colour this object should be, using the getPassageStatus() method of this object's passage.

    • getTheUUID

      public UUID getTheUUID()
      A method which returns the UUID of the passage which this PassageObject represents
      Specified by:
      getTheUUID in interface ObjectWithUUID
      Returns:
      the UUID of the passage this PassageObject represents.

    • individualUpdate

      void individualUpdate()
      Updates passage name, puts this at the same position as the passage, makes sure that the link map is as it should be
      (compares key set to the passage's linked UUIDs, if they differ, only the UUID's in the passage's linked UUIDs are kept, and then any missing links (in linked UUIDs and not in link map) are constructed and added to the map)
      Specified by:
      individualUpdate in class AbstractObject

    • drawLinks

      public void drawLinks​(Graphics2D g)
      This method draws the linkObjects associated with this object
      Specified by:
      drawLinks in interface DrawablePassageObject
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics2D thing responsible for the actual drawing stuff

    • nowSelected

      public void nowSelected()
      Call this if this PassageObject is now selected. Sets isSelected to true, and overlays the colour of this passage object with the SELECTED_COLOUR.
      Specified by:
      nowSelected in interface SelectableObject

    • deselected

      public void deselected()
      Call this when the passageObject gets deselected. sets isSelected to false.
      Specified by:
      deselected in interface SelectableObject

    • individualDraw

      void individualDraw​(Graphics2D g)
      Subclass-specific draw method.
      Specified by:
      individualDraw in class AbstractObject
      Parameters:
      g - the graphics context being used.

    • drawText

      public void drawText​(Graphics2D g)
      This method just draws the passageNameObject for this passageObject. Why? Because this way, these can all be rendered after all the passageObjects themselves, so they won't end up covered by another passageObject's rectangle.
      Specified by:
      drawText in interface DrawableObjectWithText
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics2D object responsible for the actual drawing stuff

    • move

      public void move​(Vector2D moveVector)
      Moves this object by the specified amount of movement. Updates the position of this object, updates the position of the passage, updates this passage's links, tells the model to update all the links of other passageObjects that link to this object, and updates the areaRectangle of this passage (so it can still be clicked and such)
      Specified by:
      move in interface MoveableObject
      Specified by:
      move in interface SelectableObject
      Overrides:
      move in class AbstractObject
      Parameters:
      moveVector - the vector2D representing the movement that needs to be done by this object

    • updatePositionOfSpecificLink

      public void updatePositionOfSpecificLink​(UUID updateThisOne)
      Update the position of a specific passageLinkObject
      Parameters:
      updateThisOne - the UUID of the link that needs updating

    • updateLinkedObjectPositions

      public void updateLinkedObjectPositions()
      Call this after all the passageObjects have been moved. This will ensure that all of the child passageLinkObjects belonging to this object will be moved.
